categories: Category:Imperial Navy captains of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Worhven was a captain of the Imperial Navy in command of the Imperial-class Star Destroyer Dominator during the Galactic Civil War.

Some time after the Battle of Yavin, he led the first tests of the NOVA project. Probe droids were equipped with this new cloaking device developed by Santhe/Sienar Technologies on Lianna. The technology was so effective that the Dominator completely lost control with its probe droids.
He later transported two Imperial Intelligence agents in disguise as members of the Imperial court to the planet Wukkar.
